text:
when a fo:table is declared :

<fo:table border-width="0.5mm" border-
style="solid">
...
</fo:table>

the rendering is OK for PDF but for PCL:
- the top border 
is correct
- the bottom border is correct
- the left and right border are UNDER the bottom border 

  but the width seems to be correct

is that specific to my printer (Lexmark Optra LX) 
?
creator: pgigon@voila.fr
